commentary: Sollux is a special snowflake who does not need a specibus. The amount of times that guys slice game constructs like this in half in order to express defiance...  is a thing I have no formal accounting of, sorry. Karkat did it in this very arc. Dave and Bro also do it. I'm sure it happens plenty more than that. Also, let's enjoy this preposterous bee-based computing system I came up with. It's charmingly reminiscent of Problem Sleuth lore. Remember the comb raves, the jocose honey, and all that nonsense? It's doubtful you do, tbh.
